meanings.definition: The position or role of a pastor.
meanings.sent1: She was honored to be offered one of the pastorships at the church.
meanings.sent2: In our community, pastorships are highly respected and valued.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the available pastorships was fierce, with many candidates vying for the role.
meanings.sent4: The pastorships in the small town church were like beacons of light in the community.
meanings.sent5: The responsibilities that come with pastorships require dedication and compassion.

meanings.definition: The act of serving as a pastor.
meanings.sent1: His pastorships at various churches allowed him to connect with different congregations.
meanings.sent2: Pastorships involve leading worship services and providing spiritual guidance.
meanings.sent3: The pastorships of the two brothers led to friendly competition between their congregations.
meanings.sent4: She approached her pastorships with humility and a desire to help others.
meanings.sent5: The pastorships he held throughout his career shaped him into a compassionate and understanding leader.
